About Me

Hi there! I am a first year student at the University of Toronto specializing in Computer Science and minoring in Statistics. Have a keen interest in Software Engineering, Machine Learning, Full-Stack Development and Crypto Trading.

Outside of school, I am also a sport and language enthusiast who loves to play all kinds of sports and learn different languages especially Japanese. Aspiring to pursue a career in Software Engineering or Data Science after graduation, and therefore seeking co-op and internship opportunities in related fields.

If you are interested in working with me, please feel free to contact me!

Experience

Projects

Check these out!

Personal Website

A fully-responsive personal website that showcase my experience, skills and projects, and also to demonstrate my web development skills.

Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Weather App

A weather app that can display the local weather information from the user's current location and timezone with OpenWeatherMap API, and also the ability to search for any cities' current detailed weather information with timezone offset taken into account.

Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Movie App

A visually-appealing React movie app that allows users to browse a list of popular and top-rated movies with TMDb API. Users are able to search and view movie details such as storyline, rating, duration, trailer, credit lists, reviews and recommendations.

Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js
